about_the_game:
The story of DOOT is legend.

EARTH, the year 2769. MOTHER GATOR arrived from a distant planet to host her 12th Annual INTERGALATIC HOOTENANNY & BAKE SALE. But first, she's hatched a secret plot with her employees (although they prefer ‘team members’ to feel more included) to EXTERMINATE HUMANITY.

Two Words: Plastic Straws

Four hundred and twenty… million years later, DOOT arose from ETERNAL SLUMBER to relieve his bladder - only to find that the earth has been covered a mile high with plastic drinking tubes.
Out of the corner of his eye he noticed the remnants of an Award-Winning Peach Cobbler. Only one creature can bake a dessert this good:

MOTHER GATOR

DOOT raced to his TIME MACHINE!
Oh yeah, I forgot to mention Doot has a time machine.

Doot must return to the past to STOP MOTHER GATOR from hosting her INTERGALATIC HOOTENANNY and, time permitting, DESTROYING HUMANITY
This is the story of Doot, a time traveling, blood-lustful Chihuahua from the distant future.

This is DOOT-TYPE.


  • Single Player Action
  • Cinematic Cut Scenes
  • In Game Commentary by the Developer
  • Cheats To Mix Up Gameplay
  • Special Modes

name: Doot-Type Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Greater
  • Processor: i5 or better recommended
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio or Better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 2D Side Scrolling Shoot Em Up action. Cinematic cut-scenes carry the story on a quest to locate Mother Gator's secret weapon. Unlockable cheats will mix-up the gameplay or enjoy a randomizer mode. Game includes commentary by the developer and musical composer on the process of making the game!
